conbody.p: This system operation and processing software consists of two major function modules, including image acquisition and image post-processing. The software performs medical CT image acquisition, data management, image viewing and other operations through medical imaging and computer software/hardware technologies. This aims to provide basis for image diagnosis or scientific research process and offer auxiliary means to radiologists for disease diagnosis.

li.p: Patient administration: It is mainly used for managing the patient data through managing and displaying the exam information stored in the system. With this function, the user can inquire the exam records, correct the patient information, merge/split the exams, and protect/unprotect the image information, as well as save the patient exam information and transmit it to other devices.

Patient registration: mainly used for registering patients, recording patient information and scanning information, and choosing scan protocols and patient positions. Emergency registration is provided for emergency patients. Pre-registration is supported for the patient who is not scanned once being registered.

Exam: Mainly used for data acquisition and reconstruction, and for acquisition of CT, PET and PET/CT scanning series, including scout scan, CT helical scan, CT axial scan, enhanced scan and coronary scan.

Review 2D: The user can zoom, rotate, mirror, pan and locate the images, etc., process the pseudo-colors, reverse the colors, adjust the window width and window level; make statistics on histograms and dynamic curves of images; measure the length, angle and area of images, and add texts and arrows.

Review 3D: The user can perform VR (Volume Rendering), MPR (Multi-Planar Reconstruction), MaxIP (Maximum Intensity Projection) and MinIP (Minimum Intensity Projection). The post-processing technologies include Sculpt - Volume Cropping and Target Volume - Tissue Segmentation Box.
Fusion: mainly includes the review and analysis of the PET, CT or fusion image.

Filming: It mainly includes viewport and cell layout; image copying, cutting and pasting to the designated position is supported in the film typesetting; you can insert a blank image, cell or blank page before or after the selected image, merge multiple images into one picture according to certain layout and display the picture within a cell, re-arrange the selected continuous images in an inverted sequence; the functions of series comparison and interval printing are provided.
Post-processing function configuration: Embed independent post-processing function modules based on the actual need of users and the License configuration.
